ERROR_ADMIN_ONLY: A parancs használatához adminisztrátornak kell lenned.
ERROR_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: A parancs használatához a(z) {PERMISSIONS} engedély(ek)re van szükség.
ERROR_INVALID_COLOR: A megadott szín érvénytelen. Használj érvényes HEX színt vagy a megadott előre beállított értékek egyikét.
ERROR_INVALID_CHANNEL: Meg kell adnod egy érvényes {types} csatornát.
ERROR_ONLY_OG_USER_MAY_USE_BTN: Csak az a felhasználó használhatja ezt az parancsot, aki ezt a parancsot használta.
TITLE: Title

strings.TITLE: An unknown error has occured.
strings.DESCRIPTION:
This was automatically reported to us. Here is what the error says:
{MESSAGE}

strings.TITLE: Hold it!
strings.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to use this {TYPE} in {TIME}...

options.name: color
options.description: Color to change your accent color to. Use one of the suggestions or a HEX color.

errors.NO_DISCORD_COLOR: Nincs olyan Discord-profilszíned, amelyből szinkronizálhatsz! Az egyik beállításához szerkeszd Discord felhasználói profilod, és módosítsd a profil színét.

strings.EMBED_SYNC_INFO: Your Discord profile color will be synced to your CRBT accent color.
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your info cards, when someone else visits them.

options.name: destination
options.description: Where to send the reminder (leave blank to send it by DM).

errors.PAST: You cannot set a reminder in the past.
errors.INVALID_FORMAT: The time you entered is in an invalid format, or below 0 seconds in the future.
errors.TOO_LONG: You cannot set a reminder for more than 2 years from now.
errors.REMINDERS_MAX_LIMIT: You cannot set more than 10 reminders at once.

strings.SUCCESS_DM: You will be reminded by DM
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_DM: You will be also reminded by DM.
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_CHANNEL: You will be also reminded in {CHANNEL}, in {SERVER}.

meta.description: Ping CRBT. Returns latency and connection info.
Create a poll with the given choices.

choice.description: Some choice a user can choose. Make it short, preferably.

image.description: Append an image to your poll.

multichoice.description: Allow members to vote for multiple choices. Off by default.

errors.CHOICE_EMPTY: A choice cannot be empty (excluding emoji).
errors.POLL_DATA_NOT_ALLOWED: Only chat moderators ("Manage Messages" permission) & the original poll creator can view its data and options.

strings.POLL_DESCRIPTION:
The poll will end {TIME}.
The poll creator can view options & other data by clicking the {ICON} button below.
strings.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: The poll will end {TIME}, but you can prematurely end it by using the {ICON} menu. From this menu, you can also edit the poll, delete it or view the voters.
strings.POLL_DATA_FOOTER: Note: This data will not update live. Use the button again to refresh the data.
strings.POLL_DESCRIPTION_ENDED: The poll has ended. You can no longer vote on it.
strings.POLL_RESULTS_DESCRIPTION_REST:
out of {TOTAL}!
Click the button below to view the full results.

user.description: The user whose banner to get.

meta.description: Get a user's display avatar (Server or User Profile Avatar).

user.description: The user to get the avatar of.

size.description: The size of the avatar to get.

format.description: The format of the avatar to get.

strings.EMBED_TITLE: Thanks for inviting {CRBT} to your server!
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
{CRBT} is now in {SERVERS} servers!
To get started with CRBT, simply type `/` and click its avatar!
For more help and info, visit the **[support server]({DISCORD})**.

errors.DMS_DISABLED: You must enable your DMs or unblock CRBT in order to bookmark messages.

meta.description: Create a new Role Picker, a menu for members to give themselves roles.

options.name: behavior
options.description: How the Role Picker should behave.

options.name: limit
options.description: How much roles can be selected. Set to 0 for unlimited.
A role to assign to the member when selected.

errors.BOT_MISSING_PERMS: I need the "Manage Roles" permission in order to create a Role Picker.
errors.ROLES_DO_NOT_EXIST: One or more of the selected roles have been removed. Contact an admin to resolve the issue.
errors.BUTTON_ROLES_ONCE: You can only select this role once, and you can't remove it.

strings.GENERIC_SELECTOR_TITLE: Select one or multiple roles by choosing them below.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_ADD_AGAIN: Select it again to remove it.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_REMOVE_AGAIN: Select it again to add it.
strings.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: To disable it, simply delete the Role Picker message.

MODERATION_LOGS_VIEW_SELECT_MENU_PLACEHO: View, edit or delete a strike
JOINLEAVE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Edit this message to customize the {TYPE} using the select menu below.
JOINLEAVE_PREVIEW_EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This is what the {TYPE} will look like when sent to {CHANNEL}.
ERROR_NO_MESSAGE: You must set a message first. Use {COMMAND} to set one.

help.name: help
help.description: Returns a quick help guide for CRBT.

HELP_DESCRIPTION:
Type {prefix} in the chat and click {botIcon} to get a list of Slash Commands.
You can also right click or long press a message or a user for quick actions.

CRBT comes with handy and powerful features, such as creating reminders ({reminder}), announcing new and leaving members ({settings}), getting Discord and web info ({infoCommands}, etc.)...

...with more to come! Stay up to date on CRBT by joining [our server]({link}).
HELP_AD_DESCRIPTION: Support us by adding it to your server!

winners.description: How many people can win the giveaway.

QUESTION: Question
COMMENT_DESCRIPTION: A comment to display to provide additional context.

roll.name: roll
roll.description: Roll a dice. Supports RPG dice notation.

dice.name: dice
dice.description: What dice to roll. Use 'd6' for a 6-sided die.

ROLL_ERROR_TOO_MANY_DICE: You can't roll more than 100 dice at once.

source.name: source
source.description: The source language to translate from.

TRANSLATE_ERROR_INVALID_LANGUAGE: {language} is not a valid source language.
TRANSLATE_SELECT_MENU_PLACEHOLDER: Select a language to translate to.
REMINDER_LIST_NO_REMINDERS: Uh oh, you don't have any reminders set. Use {command} to set one!
REMINDER_LIST_DESCRIPTION: You can set a new reminder using {command}.
REMINDER_LIST_SELECT_MENU_PLACEHOLDER: Select a reminder to edit or delete.
SUBJECT: Subject
REMINDER_DELETE_CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Hold on! Are you sure you want to delete this reminder, forever?!

reminder_list.description: Get a list of all of your reminders.

pick.name: pick
pick.description: Pick an item at random from a given list.

values.name: values
values.description: The values to pick from, separated by commas.

PICK_RESULT: "{value}" was picked out of the {number} given choices.

privacy.name: privacy
privacy.description: Review your CRBT privacy settings and edit them.

PRIVACY_SILENT_JOINS_DESCRIPTION: Turning this on will stop CRBT from announcing when you join a server.
PRIVACY_SILENT_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: Turning this on will stop CRBT from announcing when you leave a server.
PRIVACY_TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT logs command usage as detailed in our Privacy Policy. Turning it off will only stop those from being sent.
PRIVACY_CRBT_DATA_DESCRIPTION: CRBT collects usage data, whether you submit it or some that we track to provide features. You can download or delete all of your data. Beware, deleting will erase everything you set on CRBT (that includes Reminders, Achievements and more!!).

settings.name: settings
settings.description: Configure CRBT settings on this server.

SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Use the select menu below to update the settings for this server.
EDIT_CHANNEL_MODAL_PLACEHOLDER: You may use a Text Channel's exact name or its ID.
SETTINGS_COLOR_DESCRIPTION:
The Server Accent Color is shown on public embed messages including Polls, Giveaways, Role Pickers, the Server Info sheet among other features.
It's currently set to **{color}**.

search.name: search
search.description: Search for anything in one of the provided search engines.

anonymous.name: anonymous
anonymous.description: Search without sending a public messsage.

ERROR_MODULE_DISABLED_TITLE: This module is not enabled on the server!
ERROR_MODULE_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_REGULA: You can ask an admin of the server to enable it using {command}.
MODREPORTS_MODAL_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Describe your report and add details to go with it.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_TITLE: Your report was successfully sent to {server}'s moderators.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: This report was added to {user}'s moderation history. People with access to the chosen Moderation Reports channel will be able to review your report and act accordingly.
ROLE_INFO_PREMIUM_SUBSCRIBER: Role automatically added to Server Boosters.
ROLE_INFO_MANAGED_INTEGRATION: Role managed by an external integration.

role_info.description: Get information about a server's role.

role.description: What role to get info from.

server_info.description: Get information about a Discord server.

id.description: ID of the server to get information from.

SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_TITLE: The ID you have used is either invalid, or I'm not part of this server.
SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_DESCRIP: You can **[invite me to it]({link})**, if you have permission to.

id.description: ID of the server whose icon to get.

USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_SELF: You do not have a profile banner!
USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_OTHER: This user does not have a profile banner!

channel_info.description: Get information about a server's channel, category, thread or post.

channel.description: What channel to get info from.

emoji.description: The emoji to get info from. Default and custom emoji are supported.

EMOJI_INFO_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Try again using a default {standardEmoji} or custom {customEmoji} emoji.
INVITE_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_TITLE: Invalid server or group DM invite.
INVITE_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_DESCRIPTION: Make sure it hasn't expired, and that everyone can access it.

invite_info.description: Get information about a Discord invite.

invite.description: A server or group DM invite link or code.
